nodes.bodyText: this line is longer than 100 symbols, CI does not like it. Please wrap it
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -133,14 +144,15 @@ jobs:
          bash
          REF="origin/${{needs.parse_body.outputs.branch}}"
          REPO="../../checkstyle"
+         REF_BRANCH="upstream/master"
          if [ -f new_module_config.xml ]; then
            groovy diff.groovy -r $REPO -p $REF -pc new_module_config.xml -m single\
              -l project.properties
          elif [ -f patch_config.xml ]; then
-           groovy diff.groovy -r $REPO -b master -p $REF -bc diff_config.xml -pc patch_config.xml\
+           groovy diff.groovy -r $REPO -b $REF_BRANCH -p $REF -bc diff_config.xml -pc patch_config.xml\

nodes.bodyText: upstream's branch as a reference branch -> upstream's master branch as a base branch

         path: checkstyle
         fetch-depth: 0
+

nodes.bodyText: naming is a bit weird, please change it to something like MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -104,6 +104,17 @@ jobs:

         fetch-depth: 0
+

+         bash

nodes.bodyText:
please do git fetch original_checkstyle as separate command, not need for long lines,
We use model - fail fast. If something is failing to execute, all commands below unlikely to execute too.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -104,6 +104,17 @@ jobs:
         ref: master
         path: checkstyle
         fetch-depth: 0
+
+     # set main checkstyle repo as an upstream
+     # Diff report will be generated taking upstream's master branch as a base branch
+     - name: set upstream
+       run: |
+         cd checkstyle
+         bash
+         MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL="https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle.git"
+         git remote add original_checkstyle $MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL\
+           && git fetch original_checkstyle;

@@ -104,6 +104,17 @@ jobs:
         ref: master
         path: checkstyle
         fetch-depth: 0
+
+     # set main checkstyle repo as an upstream
+     # Diff report will be generated taking upstream's master branch as a base branch

+         bash
+         MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL="https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle.git"
+         git remote add original_checkstyle $MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL\
+           && git fetch original_checkstyle;

nodes.bodyText:
Make it
git remote add upstream $MAIN_REPO_GIT_URL
As you add whole repository, not a just one branch of it.
Sorry that I requested bad name in previous review session
